title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Gini's concentration coefficient, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Gini's concentration coefficient has decreased over the Year
Gini's concentration coefficient is roughly constant from 2008 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Max Gini's concentration coefficient about 34.5 was recorded at Year 2009
Min Gini's concentration coefficient about 33.6 was recorded at Year 2013,  2014, and 2016
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Gini's concentration coefficient, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2013.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2010.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2016.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2015.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2013 to 2014.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2010 to 2011.
